allow: Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT collection_id, collection_name, collection_name_tamil FROM collections WHERE collection_id = 321111;""")
Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT COUNT(*) FROM work_collections WHERE collection_id = 321111;""")
Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT collection_id, collection_name, collection_name_tamil FROM collections ORDER BY collection_id;""")
Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT COUNT(*) FROM work_collections;""")

Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT work_id, work_name, work_name_tamil, chronology_start_year, chronology_end_year, chronology_confidence FROM works ORDER BY work_id;""")

Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT work_name, chronology_start_year, chronology_end_year, chronology_confidence FROM works WHERE chronology_start_year IS NOT NULL ORDER BY chronology_start_year LIMIT 10;""")

Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT w.work_id, w.work_name_tamil, s.section_id, s.section_number, s.section_name, s.section_name_tamil FROM works w JOIN sections s ON w.work_id = s.work_id WHERE w.collection_id = 32118 AND w.work_id < 321805 ORDER BY w.work_id, s.section_number LIMIT 20;""")

Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 > nul && set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT w.work_id, w.work_name_tamil, COUNT(s.section_id) as section_count FROM works w LEFT JOIN sections s ON w.work_id = s.work_id WHERE w.work_id BETWEEN 321801 AND 321805 GROUP BY w.work_id, w.work_name_tamil ORDER BY w.work_id;""")

Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 > nul && set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT s.section_number, s.section_name, s.section_name_tamil FROM sections WHERE work_id = 321801 ORDER BY s.section_number;""")

Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT work_id, work_name, work_name_tamil, author, chronology_start_year, chronology_end_year, chronology_confidence FROM works ORDER BY work_id;""")

Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT work_id, work_name, work_name_tamil, chronology_start_year, chronology_end_year, chronology_confidence FROM works WHERE work_name_tamil IN (''திருவாசகம்'', ''திருஇரட்டைமணிமாலை'') ORDER BY work_id;""")

Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 > nul && set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT work_id, work_name_tamil, chronology_start_year, chronology_end_year, chronology_confidence FROM works WHERE collection_id = 321 ORDER BY chronology_start_year NULLS LAST, work_id;""")

Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 > nul && set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT work_id, work_name, work_name_tamil, author, author_tamil, chronology_start_year, chronology_end_year, chronology_confidence FROM works WHERE work_name_tamil LIKE ''%இரட்டை%'' ORDER BY chronology_start_year, work_id;""")

Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT work_id, work_name_tamil, chronology_start_year, chronology_end_year FROM works WHERE work_name_tamil LIKE ''%திருவாசகம்%'' OR work_name_tamil LIKE ''%இரட்டை%'' ORDER BY chronology_start_year, work_id;""")

Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 > nul && set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT work_id, work_name_tamil, chronology_start_year, chronology_end_year FROM works ORDER BY chronology_start_year LIMIT 20;""")

Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''word_details'' AND column_name = ''work_id'';""")
Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""DROP VIEW IF EXISTS word_details CASCADE;""")
Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -f temp_update_view.sql")

Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -c ""SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''word_details'' AND column_name IN (''work_id'', ''verse_id'', ''work_name'') ORDER BY ordinal_position;""")
Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -U postgres -d tamil_literature -f temp_update_view.sql 2>&1")
